oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hall. Charley Hall, postman, and horse.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Charley Hall, postman, posing with horse and cart. Horse is wearing mailman's hat and has letter bag.
